attributes.action: Allow driving lessons at 16, but you mut be 17 to hold a full licence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Allow lessons at 16 but you must be 17 to hold a full licence. This would mean young people keen to drive would be able to start driving earlier but also need to take lesson for over a year before possible to be allowed on the road alone. Hence making safer drivers
